Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Entity
      • entities.MovableEntity
        • entities.Pickupable
          • entities.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeleeWeapon, Projectile

    public abstract class Weapon
extends Pickupable
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Abstract class for all the different types of weapons
    Author:
    Nick Lauder
